item.title: 看看go的sync.once
item.description: 用途 once保证传入内部的函数只会执行一次 once源码 type Once struct { // done indicates whether the action has been performed. // It is first in the struct because it is used in the hot path. // The hot path is inlined at every call site. // Placing done first allows
